gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: The IceBridge Riegl Laser Altimeter L2 Geolocated Surface Elevation Triplets (ILUTP2) data set contains surface range values for Antarctica and Greenland derived from measurements captured using the Riegl Laser Altimeter. The data were collected by scientists working on the Investigating the Cryospheric Evolution of the Central Antarctic Plate (ICECAP) project, which is funded by the National Science Foundation (NSF) and the Natural Environment Research Council (NERC) with additional support from NASA Operation IceBridge.

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: Direct download, with optional registration page.
Tool to visualize, search, and download IceBridge data.
Note: Reverb will be replaced with Earthdata Search in September 2016. NASA search and order tool for subsetting, reprojecting, and reformatting data.
NASA's newest search and order tool for subsetting, reprojecting, and reformatting data.
Documentation explaining the data and how it was processed.

gmd:code.gco:CharacterString: UTIG Riegl > University of Texas Riegl LD90-3800 HiP-LR Laser Altimeter

gmi:description.gco:CharacterString: The Basler BT-67 is a fixed-wing aircraft produced by Basler Turbo Conversions of Oshkosh, Wisconsin. It is built on a retrofitted Douglas DC-3 airframe, with modifications designed to improve the DC-3 serviceable lifetime. This plane belongs to Kenn Borek Air which is an airline based in Calgary, Alberta, Canada. It operates regional passenger and cargo services, contract operations in the Arctic and Antarctic and aircraft leasing.
